text: West Coast Main Line is a main line between London and Glasgow in United Kingdom. Train services are operated by Avanti West Coast and CrossCountry. ==Stops== *Starting point at London Euston *Watford Junction *Milton Keynes Central *Rugby *Nuneaton *Tamworth *Lichfield Trent Valley *Stafford *Crewe *Warrington Bank Quay *Wigan North Western *Preston *Lancaster *Oxenholme Lake District *Penrith *Carlisle *Lockerbie *Carstairs *Motherwell *Finishing point at Glasgow Central Category:Railway lines in the United Kingdom Category:Rail transport in Scotland
title: West Coast Main Line
